subject: Use %configure instead of ./configure
commitMessage:
Use %configure instead of ./configure

For aarch64 build ./configure cannot guess build type correctly

Change-Id: I30327927d5736a04b38b17fe0c8b7fa9746d12a4
Signed-off-by: Yury Usishchev <y.usishchev@samsung.com>

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.

Patch Set 1: Verified+1

This change does not break build for armv7l, i586, x86_64. And fixes build for aarch64. Build logs can be found here: patched(https://build.tizen.org/package/show?package=yasm&project=devel%3Aarm_toolchain%3AMobile%3Atest) and original(https://build.tizen.org/package/show?package=yasm_fail&project=devel%3Aarm_toolchain%3AMobile%3Atest)
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+2
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

subject: resetting manifest requested domain to floor
commitMessage: resetting manifest requested domain to floor

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

[BUILD CHECK RESULT] This change is built against OBS project Tizen: 

 repository     arch           result         

 standard       armv7hl        succeeded      

 standard       x86_64         succeeded      

 standard       i586           succeeded
Patch Set 1: Verified; Looks good to me, approved
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
